original_title: Bach Cantata Pilgrimage – The Whole Story
overview: There was, perhaps, no more imaginative a tribute to Bach in 2000, the year which marked the 250th anniversary of the composer's death, than The Bach Cantata Pilgrimage undertaken by the Monteverdi Choir and the English Baroque Soloists under their conductor, Sir John Eliot Gardiner.
tagline: John Eliot Gardiner's tour with the Monteverdi Choir and The English Baroque Soloists
title: Bach Cantata Pilgrimage – The Whole Story
